QuestData.Title: If Words Don't Work...
QuestData.Description:
Unless you have something worth risking my life for, I will not budge.
Vanthir must have told you that my services do not come cheap.
Let's say... enough mana to sustain me for a month.
<Arluin looks smug, as if you could never agree to this request.>
QuestData.CompletionText: My price will not change. Do we have a deal?
QuestData.RewardText: Glad to know you understand the value of my services, partner.
